<APIMethods
  service="staking-api"
  network="avalanche"
  proxy="https://api-service-proxy-development.figment-secops.workers.dev"
  host="avalanche-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows"
  methods={[
    {
      name: "Create New Delegation Flow",
      content:
        "To initiate the staking process, create a new flow with a `POST` request to `/api/v1/flows`.\n\n### Parameters\n\n- `flow` — `object`\n    - `network_code` — `string` Network this flow operates on (ex. `avalanche`) (required).\n    - `chain_code` — `string` Chain this flow operates on (ex. `testnet`) (required).\n    - `operation` — `string` The operation to perform (ex. `staking`) (required).\n    - `version` — `string` API version to use (ex. `v1`) (optional).\n\n### Response\n\n- `id` — `string` ID of the flow.\n- `operation` — `string` The Staking API operation being performed by this flow.\n- `state` — `string` The current state of the flow.\n- `actions` — `array` It includes the `name` & `inputs` of all next possible actions.\n    - `create_delegate_tx` — Use this action to generate a delegation transaction to stake AVAX.\n        - `delegator_address` — The delegating address, where AVAX is being staked from. This must be a P-chain address.\n        - `validator_address` — Figment's validator address.\n        - `amount` — The amount of AVAX to be delegated.\n        - `start_time` — Optional timestamp for when the delegation will be active.\n        - `end_time` — Optional timestamp for when the delegation will end.\n        - `memo` — A plaintext memo to identify the transaction.\n- `data` — `object` Delegation flow & transaction data.",
      request: {
        method: "POST",
        header: [],
        body: {
          flow: {
            network_code: "avalanche",
            chain_code: "testnet",
            operation: "staking",
            version: "v1",
          },
        },
        url: "https://avalanche-slate.datahub.figment.io",
        headers: {
          Authorization: "e68ac2d1e2f6671a96e6a88115a3f734",
        },
        query: "api/v1/flows",
      },
      interactive: false,
      response: {
        name: "Create New Delegation Flow",

    {
      name: "Submit Delegate Data",
      content:
        "After creating a new staking flow, submit the staking account data. Collect the required inputs. Send a `PUT` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]/next` to proceed to the next step.\n\n### Parameters\n\n- `name` — `string` Name of the action to execute (required).\n- `inputs` — `object`\n    - `delegator_address` — `string` The delegating address (P-chain) (required).\n    - `validator_address` — `string` Address of the validator (required).\n    - `amount` — `number` The amount of AVAX to be delegated (required).\n    - `start_time` — `number` Adjust if you wish to set a specific delegation start time. [Unix Epoch Timestamp](https://www.unixtimestamp.com/), defaults to five minutes from when the transaction is generated (optional).\n    - `end_time` — `number` Adjust if you wish to set a specific delegation end time. [Unix Epoch Timestamp](https://www.unixtimestamp.com/), defaults to the end time of the validator (optional).\n    - `memo` — `string` Include a memo with the transaction (optional).\n\n### Response\n\n- `id` — `string` ID of the flow.\n- `operation` — `string` The Staking API operation being performed by this flow.\n- `state` — `string` The current state of the flow.\n- `actions` — `array` It includes the `name` & `inputs` of all next possible actions.\n    - `refresh_delegate_tx` — If you need to get a fresh version of the transaction Payload (i.e., the nonce has increased).\n    - `sign_delegate_tx` — Submit a signed transaction Payload ready to be broadcast to the network.\n    - `confirm_delegate_tx_by_hash` — Submit a previously completed transaction hash to continue the flow.\n- `data` — `object` Delegation flow & transaction data.",
      request: {
        method: "PUT",

    {
      name: "Submit Signed Delegate Transaction for Broadcast",
      content:
        "Before broadcasting the transaction, you must [sign the `transaction_payload`](https://docs.figment.io/guides/staking-api/figment-signing-transactions) you received in the previous step. After signing the transaction, send a `PUT` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]/next` with the signed payload.  \nThe Staking API will broadcast the transaction to the Avalanche network.\n\n### Parameters\n\n- `name` — `string` Name of the action to execute (required).\n- `inputs` — `object`\n    - `transaction_payload` — Signed transaction payload from the previous step's response.\n\n### Response\n\n- `id` — `string` ID of the flow.\n- `operation` — `string` The Staking API operation being performed by this flow.\n- `state` — `string` The current state of the flow.\n    - `delegate_tx_broadcasting` — Transaction has been broadcast and is confirming.\n    - `completed` — Transaction has been confirmed and stake is delegated.\n- `actions` — `array` It includes the `name` & `inputs` of all next possible actions.\n- `data` — `object` Delegation flow & transaction data.",
      request: {
        method: "PUT",
        header: [],
        body: {
          name: "sign_delegate_tx",
          inputs: {
            transaction_payload:
              "",
          },
        },
        url: "https://avalanche-slate.datahub.figment.io",
        headers: {
          Authorization: "e68ac2d1e2f6671a96e6a88115a3f734",
        },
        query: "api/v1/flows/{{avalancheStakingFlowId}}/next",
      },
      interactive: false,
